name: 汉弗莱·戴维
bio_short: 英国化学家和发明家，电化学的先驱。他利用电解法发现了多种新元素（如钠和钾），发明了“矿工安全灯”（戴维灯），并且是迈克尔·法拉第的导师。
bio_short_en: A British chemist and inventor. He was a pioneer of electrochemistry, discovered several new elements (like sodium and potassium) using electrolysis, invented the 'Davy lamp' for miners, and was Michael Faraday's mentor.
